<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Bard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=678) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 222 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Bard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=3)

**Prerequisites**
[Bard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=677)

</column>

---

You gain the [basic spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170). Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from the bard archetype, add a common occult spell or another spell you learned or discovered to your repertoire, of the appropriate spell level.

<title level="2">Basic Bard Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Expert Bard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=684), [Occult Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=683)
name: Basic Bard Spellcasting
